quest.feywild.quest_101_message_2: If you seek an audience with me you will have to prove your worth to me!
quest.feywild.quest_101_message_3: Hmm...So a trial of g&combat! You will fight an....Drake! Yes an  r&Overworld  r&Drake!
quest.feywild.quest_101_message_4: If you survive, I will deem you worthy to be in my presence.
quest.feywild.quest_101_message_5: If you survive....-evil giggle-...uh...cough cough...off you go!
quest.feywild.quest_305_message_1: Sigh You're still here? ... Why do you keep persisting, Mortal.
quest.feywild.quest_305_message_2: Thou as much as I would like to be your friend.
quest.feywild.quest_305_message_3: Your presence in the mortal realm is required.
quest.feywild.quest_305_message_4: Maybe we should postpone our friendship...
quest.feywild.quest_305_message_5: and strengthen your soul by linking it to a g&grave g&stone.
quest.feywild.quest_305_message_6: So...why don't you g&craft one, Mortal.
